titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to suspend future reductions of income tax rates if the Social Security surpluses are used to fund such tax rate cuts.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to suspend future reductions of income tax rates if the Social Security surpluses are used to fund such tax rate cuts.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that if there exists a Federal on-budget deficit income tax rate reductions shall be suspended until it is determined that such a deficit does not exist.
